Instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Prepare a baking sheet by lining it with parchment paper or a silicone mat.

Transfer the bread to a bowl; drizzle oil over it and sprinkle with garlic powder and basil. Use your hands to combine until the bread is thoroughly coated and the seasonings are evenly mixed. Spread the mixture onto the lined baking sheet in a single layer.
Bake in the heated oven, stirring from time to time, until the mixture is golden brown and toasted, about 6 to 10 minutes.
You can substitute olive oil for vegetable oil if you prefer.
